about.summary: Fast procedures for small set of commonly-used, design-appropriate estimators with robust standard errors and confidence intervals. Includes estimators for linear regression, instrumental variables regression, difference-in-means, Horvitz-Thompson estimation, and regression improving precision of experimental estimates by interacting treatment with centered pre-treatment covariates introduced by Lin (2013) <doi:10.1214/12-AOAS583>.

name: r-estimatr
raw_recipe:
{% set version = '0.16' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-estimatr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/estimatr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/estimatr/estimatr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 289d4fd70e25f64341df61b97d4b617fcc04050c73f75acaf3b3c9e86afea27d

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}      # [not win]
    - {{native}}toolchain        # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}sed               # [win]
    - {{posix}}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-formula
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.16
    - r-rcppeigen
    - r-generics
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-formula
    - r-rcpp >=0.12.16
    - r-rcppeigen
    - r-generics
    - r-rlang >=0.2.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('estimatr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('estimatr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://declaredesign.org/r/estimatr/, https://github.com/DeclareDesign/estimatr
  license: MIT
  summary: Fast procedures for small set of commonly-used, design-appropriate estimators with
    robust standard errors and confidence intervals. Includes estimators for linear
    regression, instrumental variables regression, difference-in-means, Horvitz-Thompson
    estimation, and regression improving precision of experimental estimates by interacting
    treatment with centered pre-treatment covariates introduced by Lin (2013) <doi:10.1214/12-AOAS583>.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: estimatr
# Type: Package
# Title: Fast Estimators for Design-Based Inference
# Version: 0.16
# Date: 2019-02-27
# Authors@R: c(person("Graeme", "Blair", email = "graeme.blair@ucla.edu", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Jasper", "Cooper", email = "jjc2247@columbia.edu", role = c("aut")), person("Alexander", "Coppock", email = "alex.coppock@yale.edu", role = c("aut")), person("Macartan", "Humphreys", email = "macartan@gmail.com", role = c("aut")), person("Luke", "Sonnet", email = "luke.sonnet@gmail.com", role = c("aut")), person("Neal", "Fultz", email = "nfultz@gmail.com", role = c("ctb")), person("Lily", "Medina", email = "lilymiru@gmail.com", role = c("ctb")))
# Description: Fast procedures for small set of commonly-used, design-appropriate estimators with robust standard errors and confidence intervals. Includes estimators for linear regression, instrumental variables regression, difference-in-means, Horvitz-Thompson estimation, and regression improving precision of experimental estimates by interacting treatment with centered pre-treatment covariates introduced by Lin (2013) <doi:10.1214/12-AOAS583>.
# URL: https://declaredesign.org/r/estimatr/, https://github.com/DeclareDesign/estimatr
# BugReports: https://github.com/DeclareDesign/estimatr/issues
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0)
# Imports: Formula, generics, methods, Rcpp (>= 0.12.16), rlang (>= 0.2.0)
# LinkingTo: Rcpp, RcppEigen
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# LazyData: true
# Suggests: fabricatr (>= 0.4), randomizr (>= 0.16), AER, clubSandwich, ivpack, lfe, margins, prediction, RcppEigen, sandwich, stargazer, testthat, car
# Enhances: texreg
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-03-01 23:39:01 UTC; luke
# Author: Graeme Blair [aut, cre], Jasper Cooper [aut], Alexander Coppock [aut], Macartan Humphreys [aut], Luke Sonnet [aut], Neal Fultz [ctb], Lily Medina [ctb]
# Maintainer: Graeme Blair <graeme.blair@ucla.edu>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-03-02 08:10:08 UTC

about.summary: Fast procedures for small set of commonly-used, design-appropriate estimators with robust standard errors and confidence intervals. Includes estimators for linear regression, instrumental variables regression, difference-in-means, Horvitz-Thompson estimation, and regression improving precision of experimental estimates by interacting treatment with centered pre-treatment covariates introduced by Lin (2013) <doi:10.1214/12-AOAS583>.
